comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F) ### Comment > Error occurs when using adguard to view video/audio content on a macOS based product. > > I believe google has now designed their audiovisual codec around the idea that if you're using a content blocker that the "audio" ad•layer containing the "smoother" audio. The one that does not peak or sound tinny will be dropped. > > Probably will continue to roll out changes like these periodically around WWDC and their own developer conferences. I know this will always be a dancing target so I'm passing on two weeks of good luck on to the poor soul that has to fix this. > > I've heard this from a few other users as well. The screen shots are useless (🫤) So here is some ideas on how to patch it. > > **0** - EMPTY your Caches & Browser cookies when testing for it. Seems to work for a minute or two. > **1** - TRY Disabling Ambient mode. > **2** - Part out the same video to two identical machines to see the "losses/spacial audio" layer. Use someone top tier (Mr. Beast, MBKHD, HBO Max, etc) because they will have access to this service ideally. > **3** - For a longer copy of the layer you are targeting use Youtube movies. The free ones might have it. Paid definitely will. > > **PS** Step 7 of your report service removes formatting from your reports. There was spaces and line breaks to make this legible. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/KXrDdzS.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/S6QSUoQ.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.13 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

uBlock Origin 1.49.2

Website or app doesn't work properly

Firefox

Desktop

https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https://www.eeva.fi/luetuimmat

comment.body:
Hello,
As far as I can see, it's a `script` not `xmlhttprequest` and another issue is probably with `redirect-rule` which is used for blocked requests only, in this case it should be rather `redirect`:
```adblock
||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$script,redirect=googletagmanager-gtm,important
```

comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Google Play: com.nexon.bluearchive (Incorrect Blocking)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Home v0.107.25

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nexon.bluearchive

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> 게임 실행 중 비정상적인 강제 종료 현상 발생. (`log.ngsm.nexon.com` 도메인 차단으로 인해 생긴 문제로 추정, 해당 도메인을 AdGuard Home 커스텀 필터링 규칙을 이용해 예외처리하면 문제가 발생하지 않음. - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/0053456cb05d8b6816ad512789dffe21c2eb94aa )
   [넥슨에서 게시한 관련 공지](https://forum.nexon.com/bluearchive/board_view?board=1018&thread=2130361&stickyBoard=1)
 
3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37508580/2661784e-10cc-40bc-bd8a-492459d95de9)
가끔 뜨는 보안 경고 팝업
</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Google Play: com.nexon.bluearchive (unexpected illegal detection)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nexon.bluearchive

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Currently Blue Archive(Nexon's mobile game) is having [unexpected disconnect issue](https://forum.nexon.com/bluearchive/board_view?board=1018&thread=2130361&stickyBoard=1) caused by DNS settings.

Original Disccusion: [Korean Forum](https://gall.dcinside.com/mgallery/board/view/?id=projectmx&no=6321288)

Blue Archive is displaying "illegal program has been detected" with unexpected closing.

Seems Nexon is using `log.ngsm.nexon.com` DNS for detecting illegal actions.

0053456cb05d8b6816ad512789dffe21c2eb94aa commit might be reverted for playing Blue Archive well. (Or allowing `ngsm.nexon.com`)

![DNS Log](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9389278/cdebc97a-6d52-41a5-9c21-8fcd37e5f790)

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Please try again when you're back online". > I have looked in the filtering log and occasionally see requests being blocked, but not every time I try to log in, only occasionally. I have tried adding exceptions for the requests being blocked, but this doesn't seem to have helped (even after a restart and shoppix-app reinstall). > If I disable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' for this specific app in the AdGuard settings, I am able to login in again. If I then re-enable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' whilst the shoppix app is still running, it acts as if it doesn't have an internet connection, insisting that it is offline. ### Screenshots

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com/movie/spirited-90331

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Perhaps it's related to them.
Please do next:
1. Leave only Antibanner module
2. Use this filter list
	```
	AdGuard Base
	AdGuard Tracking Protection
	AdGuard Annoyances
	AdGuard Experimental
	AdGuard Russian
	AdGuard German
	AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese
	AdGuard Ukrainian
	```
3. Clear browser data, restart it
4. Try to reproduce the problem

If you don't notice it, enable the other filters from your config one by one and then try to reproduce the issue. For instance, you enable `EasyList Italy` - check the site - there is no problem at all - do the same with the next filter.
In case you find the problematic one or not, feel free to write about it here.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.kantarworldpanel.shoppix%26hl%3Den_GB%26gl%3DUS%26pli%3D1) ### Comment Username: @mattjbr123 > I'm having an issue with the 'Shoppix' app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1) installed on my Android device (Google Pixel 2XL) when AdGuard is running. > When I try to login I receive an error saying "Connection required. Please try again when you're back online". > I have looked in the filtering log and occasionally see requests being blocked, but not every time I try to log in, only occasionally. I have tried adding exceptions for the requests being blocked, but this doesn't seem to have helped (even after a restart and shoppix-app reinstall). > If I disable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' for this specific app in the AdGuard settings, I am able to login in again. If I then re-enable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' whilst the shoppix app is still running, it acts as if it doesn't have an internet connection, insisting that it is offline. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/RwqiFAn.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/21n4o6I.png)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.55

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.trendyol.com/sr?wb=103500&wc=73&wcl=14&qt=trendyol%20man%20ti%C5%9F%C3%B6rt&st=trendyol%20man%20ti%C5%9F%C3%B6rt&os=1&adjust_t=h9ybh70_d50mvs0

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

This rule breaks the link and cannot redirect to the target site.
`$removeparam=adjust_t`

This rule works without issue
`trendyol.com^$removeparam=adjust_t`


<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/110184059/fea67294-0a29-43de-9dc5-20f44e0dc913)


</details>

---

These links have a tracking parameter.

```
www.ty.gl/0204_fb_kulakliktemizlemearaci
www.ty.gl/0305_fb_tisort
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.kantarworldpanel.shoppix%26hl%3Den_GB%26gl%3DUS%26pli%3D1) ### Comment Username: @mattjbr123 > I'm having an issue with the 'Shoppix' app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1) installed on my Android device (Google Pixel 2XL) when AdGuard is running. > When I try to login I receive an error saying "Connection required. Please try again when you're back online". > I have looked in the filtering log and occasionally see requests being blocked, but not every time I try to log in, only occasionally. I have tried adding exceptions for the requests being blocked, but this doesn't seem to have helped (even after a restart and shoppix-app reinstall). > If I disable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' for this specific app in the AdGuard settings, I am able to login in again. If I then re-enable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' whilst the shoppix app is still running, it acts as if it doesn't have an internet connection, insisting that it is offline. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
If you don't mind the possibility of damaging the "remove extension" button on the opened any add-on description at webpage, then you can apply the advice that Stylus displays https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2359#issuecomment-1554528074.

I assume that the AdGuard pop-up lacks space to display the note, then it is left to write a similar article in the AdGuard knowledge base.

* Optionally, AdGuard Team can play with the appearance of the icon (e.g. grayed and add an exclamation point), where you will prop up a link to KB tips in 3-4 words.

* Then AdGuard Team (or maybe @scripthunter7) could teach the any bot to add atomatic sublinking to KB to these problematic pages.

AdGuard Team could include in it KB a suggestion about these two `about:config` entries, or recommend a full version of the Windows/macOS application that should manage to skip such a restriction.

I assume that in a few months even the MV3 version of AdGuard and uBO-Lite will not be able to cope with forcing cosmetic filters there, despite the fact that network filtering supposedly occurs.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.kantarworldpanel.shoppix%26hl%3Den_GB%26gl%3DUS%26pli%3D1) ### Comment Username: @mattjbr123 > I'm having an issue with the 'Shoppix' app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kantarworldpanel.shoppix&hl=en_GB&gl=US&pli=1) installed on my Android device (Google Pixel 2XL) when AdGuard is running. > When I try to login I receive an error saying "Connection required. Please try again when you're back online". > I have looked in the filtering log and occasionally see requests being blocked, but not every time I try to log in, only occasionally. I have tried adding exceptions for the requests being blocked, but this doesn't seem to have helped (even after a restart and shoppix-app reinstall). > If I disable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' for this specific app in the AdGuard settings, I am able to login in again. If I then re-enable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' whilst the shoppix app is still running, it acts as if it doesn't have an internet connection, insisting that it is offline. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/RwqiFAn.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/21n4o6I.png)

filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

I have tried adding exceptions for the requests being blocked, but this doesn't seem to have helped (even after a restart and shoppix-app reinstall). > If I disable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' for this specific app in the AdGuard settings, I am able to login in again. If I then re-enable 'Route traffic through AdGuard' whilst the shoppix app is still running, it acts as if it doesn't have an internet connection, insisting that it is offline. ### Screenshots

thebeaconnewspapers.com##.leader-board
thebeaconnewspapers.com##.newletter-section

comment.body:
> Cannot reproduce on my end. Do cookies disappear after refreshing the page?

Yes, please try in Private Browsing. It doesn't go away if it's a new tab. If you refresh the same tab, then it will freeze the page, and every link you click will just refresh the same page instead of going to a new page.
